title: Minor optimizations to the SKWidget drawing routine
body:
While these don't dramatically improve the performance of drawing on an SKWidget, this does get rid of an unnecessary function call.  These changes are made mainly to help mitigate issue #534

The unused `DoubleBuffered` variable was also removed.

comments.author: define-private-public
comments.body: Hold on, I got the drawing VERY smooth.  I'll be posting an alternative PR soon.
